data.comment: The match is underway in Frisco.
The match is underway in Frisco.
Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Dallas.
Throw-in Montreal.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Montreal.
Free kick Dallas.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Jesus Ferreira (Dallas) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Frisco, Dallas push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Victor Rivas awards Montreal a goal kick.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Dallas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Goal kick for Montreal at Toyota Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Montreal in Frisco.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Montreal.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Dallas drives forward and Jesus Ferreira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
In Frisco, Zdenek Ondrasek of Dallas is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Dallas have a goal kick.
Dallas push forward at Toyota Stadium and Zdenek Ondrasek gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Montreal defence.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Dallas pushes forward through Matt Hedges, whose finish on goal is saved.
Victor Rivas awards Montreal a goal kick.
Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
Dallas's Zdenek Ondrasek gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montreal defender.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Dallas will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Montreal.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Goal kick for Montreal at Toyota Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Free kick Dallas.
The first-half has come to a close in Frisco.
The second-half is underway at Toyota Stadium.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of Dallas.
Victor Rivas awards Dallas a goal kick.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Maximiliano Urruti is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Montreal's Maximiliano Urruti looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in Montreal.
Goal kick for Montreal at Toyota Stadium.
Important block from the Montreal defence as Zdenek Ondrasek fires in a strike for Dallas.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Dallas are coming forward and Reto Ziegler gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Throw-in for Montreal at Toyota Stadium.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Victor Rivas signals a Montreal throw-in in Dallas's half.
Thierry Henry is making the team's first substitution at Toyota Stadium with Orji Okwonkwo replacing Anthony Jackson-Hamel.
Goal! Maximiliano Urruti gives Montreal a 0-1 lead in Frisco.
Orji Okwonkwo instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Zdenek Ondrasek of Dallas smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Victor Rivas signals a Dallas throw-in in Montreal's half.
Harold Mosquera is replacing Fafa Picault for the home team.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Luchi Gonzalez (Dallas) is making a second substitution, with Paxton Pomykal replacing Tanner Tessmann.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Montreal take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Maximiliano Urruti.
Dallas's Ryan Hollingshead misses with an attempt on goal.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Maximiliano Urruti (Montreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dallas have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Montreal at Toyota Stadium.
The home team have replaced Jesus Ferreira with Ricardo Pepi. This is the third substitution made today by Luchi Gonzalez.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Dallas.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Dallas just outside Montreal's area.
Victor Rivas awards Montreal a goal kick.
Reggie Cannon is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Zdenek Ondrasek (Dallas) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 1-2 at Toyota Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Reggie Cannon.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Reto Ziegler for Dallas has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shamit Shome is on a sub for Romell Quioto for Montreal.
Montreal make their third substitution with Amar Sejdic replacing Maximiliano Urruti.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montreal needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
